Header.title: Avinayana Dance Academy
Header.paragraph: Avinayana Dance Academy is a premier institution specializing in classical, semi-classical,and folk dance forms. Founded by the esteemed Mrs. Rojalin Sundaray, the academyis dedicated to fostering a deep appreciation for Indian dance traditions.

About.paragraph: Avinayana Dance Academy is a premier institution specializing in classical, semi-classical,and folk dance forms. Founded by the esteemed Mrs. Rojalin Sundaray, the academy is dedicated to fostering a deep appreciation for Indian dance traditions. With its headquartersin Pattaniakia, Sakhigopal, and a newly opened branch in Trisulia, Cuttack, Avinayana Dance Academy has become a significant cultural center for aspiring dancers.

Services.name: Beginner Dance Classes
Services.text: Perfect for those just starting out! Learn the fundamentals of movement, rhythm, and coordination in a fun and supportive environment.

Services.name: Odissi Classical Dance Training
Services.text: Dive into the grace and spiritual depth of Odissi, one of Indiaâ€™s oldest classical dance forms. our expert-led training helps you master this elegant art form with authenticity and discipline.

Services.name: Sambalpuri & Folk Dance Styles
Services.text: Celebrate the rich cultural heritage of India through vibrant Sambalpuri and traditional folk dance forms. Learn expressive movements, rhythmic footwork, and the stories behind each dance in an energetic and joyful environment.

Services.name: Dance Workshops & Masterclasses
Services.text: Level up your skills with our exclusive workshops and masterclasses led by guest artists and industry professionals. From technique refinement to performance tips, get inspired and grow as a dancer!

Services.name: Kids Dance Program
Services.text: Specially crafted for little feet! Our kids' sessions combine fun and learning, focusing on basic techniques, expression, and confidence building.

Services.name: Choreography for Events
Services.text: Make your special day unforgettable! We offer customized choreography for weddings, school functions, corporate events, and more.

Contact.address: Naranpur, near Indian OIL Petrol Pump Infront of KIIS Ladies Hostel, near Trisulia, Odisha 754005
